shared.model.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the clients game. It is designed as a singleton pattern for the easiness of the client
    Author:
    Raul Lopez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Bank bank
      The games's Bank class to keep track of the game's decks

      The games's TradeManager class to keep track of all user's trading

      The games's TurnManager class to keep track of all user's turns

      The games's UserManager class to keep track of all users
